archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.4.1c: c) methods for managing the use of code samples (e.g. defining acceptable sources for developers to obtain sample code and requiring a security review of any sample code before it can be used in the system)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
